query:
INSERT INTO validation_rules (ruleName, ruleType, enabled, config, errorMessage, severity) VALUES 
('require_match_proof', 'game_requirement', true, '{"requireScreenshot":true}', 'Screenshot proof is required for badge upgrade requests', 'error'),
('max_upgrades_per_window', 'badge_limit', true, '{"maxUpgrades":6,"windowType":"fa"}', 'Maximum 6 badge upgrades allowed per FA window', 'error'),
('auto_approve_bronze', 'badge_limit', false, '{"autoApprove":true,"tier":"bronze"}', NULL, 'warning'),
('min_attributes_required', 'attribute_check', true, '{"minAttributes":3}', 'At least 3 attributes must be specified for upgrade request', 'error'),
('allow_duplicate_badges', 'badge_limit', false, '{"allowDuplicates":false}', 'Duplicate badges at different tiers are not allowed', 'warning'),
('upgrade_cooldown_period', 'cooldown', true, '{"cooldownHours":24,"perPlayer":true}', 'Must wait 24 hours between upgrade requests for the same player', 'error')
